messages.title: Voting Labour here only helps him win
messages.content: Here’s why independent ‘Best for Britain’ is recommending you vote Liberal Democrat in Altrincham & Sale West: Labour finished fourth in the 2019 European Elections. Labour have never won in Altrincham & Sale West. Voting Labour in Altrincham & Sale West splits the anti-Tory Remain vote and risks letting Boris Johnson’s candidate win. Make sure your vote counts. Back the Liberal Democrats.

messages.title: Your vote will make the difference...
messages.content: A pro-European candidate can win here in Altrincham & Sale West if you vote for them. Independent pro-Remain group ‘Best for Britain’ recommends you vote tactically for: Liberal Democrats

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Backing Liberal Democrats to unite the anti-Tory Remain vote.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting Labour in Altrincham & Sale West splits the anti-Tory Remain vote and risks letting Boris Johnson’s candidate win.

issues.brexitEurope: A pro-European candidate can win here in Altrincham & Sale West if you vote for them. The Lib Dems are unequivocal remainers who want to stop Brexit from happening.
